comment: при клике на обжи на свалке в начале главы

languages.text: Проклятый Кунрад убил ваших людей, сорвал ваш стяг и повесил вместо него свою еретическую тряпку!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
languages.original_text: Проклятый Кунрад убил ваших людей, сорвал ваш стяг и повесил вместо него свою еретическую тряпку!

traits.locale_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!
Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

languages.text: ボイトヴィルめ！彼はあなたの仲間を殺し、旗を引き裂き、それを彼の異端のボロ布としたのだ！
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: ボイトヴィルめ！彼はあなたの仲間を殺し、旗を引き裂き、それを彼の異端のボロ布としたのだ！

languages.text: 该死的维特威尔！他杀了你的人，扯烂了你的旗帜，还挂上了异端分子的破布！
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: 该死的维特威尔！他杀了你的人，扯烂了你的旗帜，还挂上了异端分子的破布！

languages.text: ¡Maldito Voigtvir! ¡Ha matado a tu gente, ha desgarrado tu estandarte y lo ha reemplazado con su harapo herético!
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: ¡Maldito Voigtvir! ¡Ha matado a tu gente, ha desgarrado tu estandarte y lo ha reemplazado con su harapo herético!

languages.text: Verfluchter Voigtvir! Er hat deine Leute ermordet, dein Banner heruntergerissen und es durch diesen ketzerischen Lumpen ersetzt!
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: Verfluchter Voigtvir! Er hat deine Leute ermordet, dein Banner heruntergerissen und es durch diesen ketzerischen Lumpen ersetzt!

languages.text: Maudit Voigtvir ! Il a tué vos hommes et remplacé votre bannière par son torchon hérétique !
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: Maudit Voigtvir ! Il a tué vos hommes et remplacé votre bannière par son torchon hérétique !

languages.text: Kahrolası Voigtvir! İnsanlarını öldürdü, sancağını indirip yerine bu kâfirce paçavrayı astı!
languages.original_text: Blasted Voigtvir! He killed your people, tore down your banner, and replaced it with his heretical rag!

traits.locale_text: Kahrolası Voigtvir! Senin insanlarını öldürdü, sancağını indirdi ve bu kâfir paçavrayı astı!
